data.lyric:
[ti:Am I The Only One]
[ar:Aaron Lewis]
[al:Am I The Only One (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.50]Am I The Only One - Aaron Lewis
[00:01.33]Lyrics by：Aaron Lewis/Ira Dean/Jeffrey Steele
[00:02.48]Composed by：Aaron Lewis/Ira Dean/Jeffrey Steele
[00:04.03]
[00:18.94]Am I the only one here tonight
[00:22.69]
[00:23.82]Shakin' my head and thinkin' somethin' ain't right
[00:27.75]Is it just me
[00:29.12]
[00:29.89]Am I losin' my mind
[00:31.90]Am I standin' on the edge of the end of time
[00:35.92]Am I the only one
[00:37.72]
[00:38.43]Tell me I'm not
[00:39.77]
[00:41.23]Who thinks they're takin' all the good we got
[00:43.99]
[00:45.05]And turnin' it bad hell I'll be d**ned
[00:48.23]
[00:48.79]I think I'm turnin' into my old man
[00:52.63]
[00:55.18]Am I the only one willin' to bleed
[00:59.25]
[01:00.47]Or take a bullet for bein' free
[01:03.32]
[01:05.03]Screamin' "What the hell" at my TV
[01:08.45]For tellin' me yeah are you tellin' me
[01:12.29]That I'm the only one willin' to fight
[01:16.44]
[01:17.82]For my love of the red and white
[01:20.73]And the blue burnin' on the ground
[01:25.25]Another statue comin' down in a town near you
[01:29.99]Watchin' the threads of Old Glory come undone
[01:34.72]
[01:38.14]Am I the only one not brainwashed
[01:41.97]
[01:43.19]Makin' my way through the land of the lost
[01:46.94]Who sees it as it is and worries 'bout his kids
[01:51.17]As they try to undo all the things he did
[01:55.45]Am I the only one who can't take no more
[01:59.01]
[01:59.66]Screamin' "If you don't like it there's the frickin' door"
[02:03.38]
[02:04.76]This ain't the freedom we've been fightin' for
[02:08.00]It was somethin' more yeah it was somethin' more
[02:12.21]Am I the only one willin' to fight
[02:16.43]
[02:17.86]For my love of the red and white
[02:20.89]And the blue burnin' on the ground
[02:25.38]Another statue comin' down in a town near you
[02:29.97]Watchin' the threads of Old Glory come undone
[02:34.72]
[02:38.45]I'm not the only one
[02:39.32]
[02:45.42]I can't be the only one
[02:50.85]
[02:55.53]Am I the only one who quits singin' along
[02:59.33]
[03:00.73]Every time they play a Springsteen song
[03:04.53]
[03:16.94]Am I the only one sittin' here
[03:20.59]
[03:22.06]Still holdin' on holdin' back my tears
[03:25.54]For the ones who paid with the lives they gave
[03:29.66]God bless the U.S.A
[03:32.81]I'm not the only one willin' to fight
[03:37.84]
[03:39.29]For my love of the red and white
[03:41.84]
[03:42.35]And the blue burnin' on the ground
[03:46.60]Another statue comin' down in a town near you
[03:51.34]Watchin' the threads of Old Glory come undone
[03:56.17]
[04:00.96]I'm not the only one
[04:03.35]
[04:09.29]I can't be the only one
data.trans:
[ti:Am I The Only One]
[ar:Aaron Lewis]
[al:Am I The Only One (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.50]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.33]//
[00:02.48]//
[00:04.03]
[00:18.94]今夜在这里 只有我一个人吗
[00:22.69]
[00:23.82]我摇摇头 觉得不该是这样
[00:27.75]只有我吗
[00:29.12]
[00:29.89]是我疯了吗
[00:31.90]我是否站在了世界末日前
[00:35.92]只有我一个人吗
[00:37.72]
[00:38.43]告诉我不是只有我
[00:39.77]
[00:41.23]有谁觉得他们要夺走我们的所有幸福
[00:43.99]
[00:45.05]将其变成不幸 见鬼 我会被诅咒
[00:48.23]
[00:48.79]我觉得我就要变成我父亲那样
[00:52.63]
[00:55.18]只有我吗 愿意抛头颅洒热血
[00:59.25]
[01:00.47]甘愿挡下子弹换来自由
[01:03.32]
[01:05.03]对着我的电视大喊 都在搞什么鬼
[01:08.45]谢谢你告诉我 你是在跟我说吗
[01:12.29]只有我愿意去抗争吗
[01:16.44]
[01:17.82]因为我深爱这面红白蓝相间的旗帜
[01:20.73]我的爱在这片土地熊熊燃烧
[01:25.25]你邻近城镇又有一座雕塑被放倒
[01:29.99]看着星条旗被撕毁
[01:34.72]
[01:38.14]没被洗脑的人只有我吗
[01:41.97]
[01:43.19]在这片迷失之地找到自己的路
[01:46.94]这个国家还在乎着 还担心着自己的孩子
[01:51.17]而他的孩子正试图抹掉他的所有成就
[01:55.45]是否只有我 再也无法忍受
[01:59.01]
[01:59.66]大声呐喊 你如果不喜欢 那就打开门滚出去
[02:03.38]
[02:04.76]这不是我们为之奋斗的自由
[02:08.00]这要过分得多 这要过分得多
[02:12.21]只有我愿意去抗争吗
[02:16.43]
[02:17.86]因为我深爱这面红白蓝相间的旗帜
[02:20.89]我的爱在这片土地熊熊燃烧
[02:25.38]你邻近城镇又有一座雕塑被放倒
[02:29.97]看着星条旗被撕毁
[02:34.72]
[02:38.45]不是只有我义愤填膺
[02:39.32]
[02:45.42]不能只有我心有不平
[02:50.85]
[02:55.53]每一次他们放出Springsteen的歌曲
[02:59.33]
[03:00.73]只有我没有跟着人群合唱吗
[03:04.53]
[03:16.94]只有我一个人坐在这里吗
[03:20.59]
[03:22.06]仍然在坚持 憋着我的眼泪
[03:25.54]为了那些为这个国家献出了生命的人
[03:29.66]上帝保佑美国
[03:32.81]我不是唯一一个愿意去抗争的人
[03:37.84]
[03:39.29]因为我深爱这面红白蓝相间的旗帜
[03:41.84]
[03:42.35]我的爱在这片土地熊熊燃烧
[03:46.60]你邻近城镇又有一座雕塑被放倒
[03:51.34]看着星条旗被撕毁
[03:56.17]
[04:00.96]不是只有我义愤填膺
[04:03.35]
[04:09.29]不能只有我心有不平
